page.title: 09WHALE ISLAND
page.content: Whale Island is an almost flat island of 79 acres situated in Portsmouth Harbour. This island is man-made from soil taken from Portsmouth Dockyard by convict labour and covers two smaller islands. It was purpose built to house {HMS Excellent. }This naval shore base is famous as a School of Naval Gunnery, but has recently changed its role to a School of Naval General Training, the training being in Internal Security, Leadership, Nuclear Biological Defence and Damage Control. The Royal Naval Display Team is also trained there, and training in Ceremonial Gunnery (Field Gun Crews and Gun Carriage Crews for state funerals) also takes place there. Training also in firefighting and signals will also take place there in the near future.
